overview: Teresa oversees all aspects of AdReady’s finances, including corporate accounting, tax matters, and financial analysis. Teresa also leads AdReady’s human resources team. Prior to AdReady, she served as Corporate Controller for Onyx Software, with responsibility for worldwide SEC reporting, tax compliance, and Sarbanes-Oxley compliance. Teresa was also the Vice President of Finance & Administration for Classmates Online, where she built and led a team that was responsible for accounting, legal issues, financial analysis, and treasury and cash management. She graduated summa cum laude and earned a BS in Management from the A.B. Freeman School of Business at Tulane University.
